Tuina is a type of massage that uses pressure and strokes to help improve circulation, relieve pain, and promote relaxation. It is an effective treatment for a variety of conditions, and can be used alone or in combination with other treatments. Tuina massage focuses on the body's meridian channels, which are energy pathways that run throughout the body.
